title: Easy lee sin jungle carry
body: Start boots and red buff, run up to enemy lane, launch q in general direction of solo laner. If q misses, blame lag or glitch/ call enemy laner a lucky noob in all chat. If it lands, immediately mash q then e while autoing them...if they are still alive, keep autoing and press w/e buttons you have open. If they die, make sure to say LOL GJ SCRUB MEXICAN in all chat. If, by some freak chance they escape or kill you, be sure to call them a fing hacker in all chat. Go back, buy items, kill more stuff. Continue doing this until the "teamfight" stage where you should be helping your team push and obtain objectives. At this stage of the game, you must, as a Lee player, run around alone in the enemy jungle hunting enemy champions. If you happen to die, you should say GG NOOB FEADER TEAM SCRUBS GG ******S STOOPID RIOT GIV ME BAD TEEM in all chat. Tah-dah, you've just played Bronze ELO jungle lee.

replies.body: Then get ready for ban due to offensive language.

Lol whatever. I have reported the same players over and over and nothing, they still join my games and act like OP said. Or worse.

Bronze Elo is a joke, players try to act all high and mighty and do what the high rank players do, but don't actually know what to do.

The problem is, seeing someone do something and knowing what they done is 2 different things.
Just gotta look past it and git gud. If you git gud you'll git out
Call enemy a lucky noob hahahahaha I died. This totally just happened in a silver 2/gold5 game
